name: amazonian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a woman) tall, strong, or forceful: A tall, broad-shouldered, Amazonian woman towered above us. In her pictures, she is the embodiment of blonde amazonian beauty. See
amazon
More examplesFewer examplesThe tennis star has transformed from leggy blonde into an Amazonian sporting goddess. She has a quirky beauty and is shorter than the amazonian supermodels you often see.
